Severe weather is expected to disrupt holiday travel in the New York area, while NYC faces rising budget gaps and a potential strike by nurses across 12 hospitals; additionally, recent incidents highlight ongoing safety concerns in the city, including multiple subway slashings and a tragic death linked to allergic reactions in custody.

### Risks & Alerts

- Snow and rain mix threatens to snarl holiday travel in New York, New Jersey area. [↗](https://news.google.?oc=5)
- Fires have claimed the lives of more than a dozen elderly NYC residents over the last 6 weeks. [↗](https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMizgFBVV95cUxOMVdPeFlESU9ybjFndG1wQkZzbWVrSjJUQy1SZjNHaW4wSXU3X3VSbm5YYXF6cTJQOURmN1pGZC1fcUFJR19WSmJheU9vaVZrYTJiWlo5MnRTaUM1eDdkVE1iWm9uNkd4YlRoajB2UEdCYTNWNURwWVdMRXJFNTFMRlBSbVhCcDM3bU9GT0theHNaSHBmdXpadlZXb0NhSUhXR1lueHctZTcxdjgyZEgxREVtcVlRTHVBYXFDeEcxVGZrelZvcExfS0VPcDktUQ?oc=5)
